scripts.build: npm run build -w govuk-rewrite && npm run build -w govuk-rewrite-cli
scripts.relink: npm unlink -g govuk-rewrite-cli 2>/dev/null; npm run build && npm link ./packages/cli
scripts.dev: npm run build -w govuk-rewrite && npm run dev -w govuk-rewrite-cli --
scripts.test: npm run test -w govuk-rewrite && npm run test -w govuk-rewrite-cli
